all_mod = summary(regsubsets(build_formula("Log_SalePrice", predictors), data = house_data, nvmax = 20))
all_mod$adjr2

vars  = optimize_vif("Log_SalePrice", vars, data = house_data, 
                     must_have = c("OverallQual", "Log_GrLivArea"))
good_vif_model_2 = lm(build_formula("Log_SalePrice", vars), data = house_data)
vif(good_vif_model_2)
summary(good_vif_model_2)$r.squared
